mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOKLIST ORDER BY BOOKTITLE
SELECT B.BOOKTITLE AS BOOKTITLE, COUNT(*) AS RENTALCOUNT FROM RENTAL A LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOKLIST B ON A.BOOKCODE = B.BOOKCODE GROUP BY B.BOOKTITLE
SELECT * FROM BOOKLIST WHERE WRITER LIKE '%'|| #{writer} ||'%' ORDER BY BOOKTITLE
SELECT * FROM BOOKLIST WHERE BOOKTITLE LIKE '%'|| #{bookTitle} ||'%'
SELECT * FROM BOOKLIST WHERE WRITER LIKE '%'|| #{writer} ||'%' OR BOOKTITLE LIKE '%'|| #{bookTitle} ||'%' ORDER BY BOOKTITLE
